title: The Oberoi Rajvilas, Jaipur named best hotel in the world by Travel + Leisure, USA Worldâ€™s Best Awards 2024
description: The Oberoi Rajvilas, Jaipur was awarded Best Hotel in the World by Travel + Leisure, USA, setting new luxury benchmarks since its opening in 1997, offering bespoke dining, a spa, and cultural experiences in a Rajasthani fort setting with rooms, luxury tents, and villas. The Oberoi Group's CEO Vikram Oberoi expressed pride in this accolade, while EIH Ltd, the chain's flagship, reported a significant increase in net profit and revenue for fiscal 2024.
